022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.command.BaseCommand;
024import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.PercentBigDecimal;
025import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.AllSupport;
026import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.EnderSupport;
027import net.tnemc.core.command.parameters.resolver.annotation.InventorySupport;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.bukkit.impl.BukkitCMDSource;
031import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Default;
032import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Description;
033import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Named;
034import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Subcommand;
035import revxrsal.commands.annotation.Usage;
036import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.actor.BukkitCommandActor;
037import revxrsal.commands.bukkit.annotation.CommandPermission;
038import revxrsal.commands.help.Help;
039import revxrsal.commands.orphan.OrphanCommand;
040
041/**
042 * CurrencyMoneyCommand
043 *
044 * @author creatorfromhell
045 * @since 0.1.4.0
046 */
047public class CurrencyMoneyCommand implements OrphanCommand {
048
049  private final Currency currency;
050
051  public CurrencyMoneyCommand(final Currency currency) {
052
053    this.currency = currency;
054  }
055
056  @Subcommand({ "balmenu", "menu", "mybal" })
057  @Usage("Money.MyBal.Arguments")
058  @Description("Money.MyBal.Description")
059  @CommandPermission("tne.money.mybal")
060  public void onMyBal(final BukkitCommandActor sender) {
061
062    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onMyBal(new BukkitCMDSource(sender));
063  }
064
065  @Subcommand({ "help", "?" })
066  @Usage("Help.Arguments")
067  @Description("Help.Description")
068  public void help(final BukkitCommandActor actor, final Help.RelatedCommands<?> commands, @Default("1") final int page) {
069
070    BaseCommand.help(new BukkitCMDSource(actor), commands, page);
071  }
072
073  //@DefaultFor({ "bal", "money", "eco", "balance" })
074  @Subcommand({ "balance", "bal", "val" })
075  @Usage("Money.Balance.Arguments")
076  @Description("Money.Balance.Description")
077  @CommandPermission("tne.money.balance")
078  public void onBalance(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
079
080    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onBalance(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), currency, region);
081  }
082
083  @Subcommand({ "convert" })
084  @Usage("Money.Convert.Arguments")
085  @Description("Money.Convert.Description")
086  @CommandPermission("tne.money.convert")
087  public void onConvert(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final PercentBigDecimal amount, @Named("currency") final Currency currency, @Named("currencyfrom") final Currency from) {
088
089    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onConvert(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, from);
090  }
091
092  @Subcommand({ "deposit" })
093  @Usage("Money.Deposit.Arguments")
094  @Description("Money.Deposit.Description")
095  @CommandPermission("tne.money.deposit")
096  @InventorySupport
097  @EnderSupport
098  @AllSupport
099  public void onDeposit(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
100
101    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onDeposit(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
102  }
103
104  @Subcommand({ "giveall", "+a", "addall" })
105  @Usage("Money.GiveAll.Arguments")
106  @Description("Money.GiveAll.Description")
107  @CommandPermission("tne.money.giveall")
108  public void onGiveAll(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
109
110    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveAll(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, region, currency);
111  }
112
113  @Subcommand({ "give", "+", "add" })
114  @Usage("Money.Give.Arguments")
115  @Description("Money.Give.Description")
116  @CommandPermission("tne.money.give")
117  public void onGive(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney parseMoney, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
118
119    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGive(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, parseMoney, region, currency);
120  }
121
122  @Subcommand({ "givenote", "+note", "addnote" })
123  @Usage("Money.GiveNote.Arguments")
124  @Description("Money.GiveNote.Description")
125  @CommandPermission("tne.money.givenote")
126  public void onGiveNote(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount) {
127
128    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onGiveNote(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
129  }
130
131  @Subcommand({ "note", "n" })
132  @Usage("Money.Note.Arguments")
133  @Description("Money.Note.Description")
134  @CommandPermission("tne.money.note")
135  @InventorySupport
136  @EnderSupport
137  @AllSupport
138  public void onNote(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount) {
139
140    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onNote(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency);
141  }
142
143  @Subcommand({ "other", "check", "balo" })
144  @Usage("Money.Other.Arguments")
145  @Description("Money.Other.Description")
146  @CommandPermission("tne.money.other")
147  public void onOther(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
148
149    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onOther(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, region, currency);
150  }
151
152  @Subcommand({ "pay", "send", "transfer" })
153  @Usage("Money.Pay.Arguments")
154  @Description("Money.Pay.Description")
155  @CommandPermission("tne.money.pay")
156  @InventorySupport
157  @EnderSupport
158  @AllSupport
159  public void onPay(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount) {
160
161    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onPay(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
162  }
163
164  @Subcommand({ "request" })
165  @Usage("Money.Request.Arguments")
166  @Description("Money.Request.Description")
167  @CommandPermission("tne.money.Request")
168  public void onRequest(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount) {
169
170    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onRequest(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, currency);
171  }
172
173  @Subcommand({ "set", "eq", "=" })
174  @Usage("Money.Set.Arguments")
175  @Description("Money.Set.Description")
176  @CommandPermission("tne.money.set")
177  public void onSet(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
178
179    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSet(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, region, currency);
180  }
181
182  @Subcommand({ "setall" })
183  @Usage("Money.SetAll.Arguments")
184  @Description("Money.SetAll.Description")
185  @CommandPermission("tne.money.setall")
186  public void onSetAll(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
187
188    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onSetAll(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, region, currency);
189  }
190
191  @Subcommand({ "take", "minus", "remove", "-" })
192  @Usage("Money.Take.Arguments")
193  @Description("Money.Take.Description")
194  @CommandPermission("tne.money.take")
195  @InventorySupport
196  @EnderSupport
197  @AllSupport
198  public void onTake(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("account") final Account player, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
199
200    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTake(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), player, amount, region, currency);
201  }
202
203  @Subcommand({ "top", "baltop" })
204  @Usage("Money.Top.Arguments")
205  @Description("Money.Top.Description")
206  @CommandPermission("tne.money.top")
207  public void onTop(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Default("1") final Integer page, @Default("false") final Boolean refresh) {
208
209    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onTop(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), page, currency, refresh);
210  }
211
212  @Subcommand({ "withdraw" })
213  @Usage("Money.Withdraw.Arguments")
214  @Description("Money.Withdraw.Description")
215  @CommandPermission("tne.money.withdraw")
216  @AllSupport
217  public void onWithdraw(final BukkitCommandActor sender, @Named("amount") final ParseMoney amount, @Default("world-113") @Named("region") final String region) {
218
219    net.tnemc.core.command.MoneyCommand.onWithdraw(new BukkitCMDSource(sender), amount, currency, region);
220  }
221}
